# showsPointsOfInterest

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the map displays point-of-interest information.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var showsPointsOfInterest: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

When this property is set to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true], the map displays icons and labels for restaurants, schools, and other relevant points of interest. The [doc://com.apple.mapkit/documentation/MapKit/MKMapView/mapType] property must be set to [doc://com.apple.mapkit/documentation/MapKit/MKMapType/standard] or [doc://com.apple.mapkit/documentation/MapKit/MKMapType/hybrid] for points of interest to be displayed.The default value of this property is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true].

## Properties

- **filterType**: The filter options for the search results.
- **pinColor**: The color of the pin head.
- **showsPointsOfInterest**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the map displays point-of-interest information.
- **mapType**: The map’s visual style.
